text: Lloyd Cowan (8 July 1962 â€“ January 2021) was a British track and field athlete."Lloyd Cowan", The Power of 10 athletics website. He was born in London. Cowan was selected for the 1984 Los Angeles Olympics, but he could not go because of an illness. He represented England in the 110 metres hurdles event, at the 1994 Commonwealth Games. He won his last medal at the AAA nationals in 1999. On 11 January 2021, it was announced that Cowan had died at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British athletes Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:Hurdlers Category:Sportspeople from London Category:Sportspeople from Essex
title: Lloyd Cowan
